com.programmingchronicles.tdd.data.support

Class JdbcAddressBookDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.programmingchronicles.tdd.data.support.JdbcAddressBookDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddressBookDao

    public class JdbcAddressBookDao
extends Object
implements AddressBookDao
    Implementación de AddressBookDao basada en JDBC.

    La implementación depende a su vez un DataSource que se configurará mediante IoC / DI.

    Author:
    Pedro Ballesteros
